Room.Name: Highland Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Highland Avenue, parallel to the East City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The massive City Walls run parallel to Highland Avenue for almost the entire span of the road. On the west side of the road is the Highland Stables, where visitors and guests may leave their steeds in order to walk around town without having to worry about the safety of their horses and the people on the streets.
